@crwildman bullshit.  It's hosted at cosspiracyhub but piratebay removes their tracker when torrents are uploaded.
@crwildman bull.  It's hosted at conspiracyhub but piratebay removes their tracker when torrents are uploaded.
PeerBlocker shows Justice-Gov monitoring this torrent.  Use at your own risk.
@crwildman if they are it's because they don't want people finding out about genocide.

@crwildman Can you explain how you are associating J.gov with this torrent?  Peerguardian only say it's the torrent client at best or overall your system is using a J.gov IP, not a particular torrent.  Are you saying J.Gov are downloading the torrent?

I think you're full of it, but you get a chance to explain yourself.

@e8hffff  J.gov was trying to establish connections to my server when I accessed this torrent.  It is simple as that.  What else is there to explain?  They are the Anti-Piracy agency who report users for downloading pirated content.  Anyone who downloads this will surely get a letter from your ISP regarding piracy if you live in the US.   Download at your own risk.   I will wait for a trusted user to upload it such as extremezone , scenes4all, acesn8s... ect...  If you guys don't give a shit, go ahead and download away :)   I am just giving you guys a warning on IP 149.101.146.50 trying to connect on a unknown protocol, and this being the only active file at the time.   So hope you enjoy the movie, I wont be watching it from this source.

@crwildman if you're the creator of this documentary then you just need to say so and ask people to stop sharing and there's a great chance it will be removed.  Many documentary makers really want their content out to the masses, even though they do want sales too.
lol yea thats whats im going to tell them too when i get my piracy notice from trying to download this torrent haha,  Ill let u know if it works
